ows:ServiceIdentification.ows:Title: Test configuration of MapServer used to demonstrate EOxServer
ows:ServiceIdentification.ows:Abstract: Test configuration of MapServer used to demonstrate EOxServer The MERIS test data is produced from the following ESA remote sensing data: MERIS L1b sample data available at: http://earth.esa.int/object/index.cfm?fobjectid=4320 Copyright (C) European Space Agency - ESA

ows:ServiceProvider.ows:ProviderName: EOX IT Services GmbH - HG Wien - FN 312068z - UID ATU64265057

ows:ContactInfo.ows:HoursOfService: Mon - Fri 10:30 - 17:00 CET and CEST respectively excl. Austrian holidays
ows:ContactInfo.ows:ContactInstructions: E-mails are usually answered within 3 working days.

wps:ProcessSummary.ows:Title: Get times of collection coverages.
wps:ProcessSummary.ows:Abstract: Query collection and get list of coverages and their times and spatial extents. The process is used by the time-slider of the EOxClient (web client).

wps:ProcessSummary.ows:Title: Get the hight profile for a coverage
wps:ProcessSummary.ows:Abstract: provides a height profile between 2 points within a coverage.

wps:ProcessSummary.ows:Title: Get statistics for a coverage/s that intersects with the input bbox
wps:ProcessSummary.ows:Abstract: provides statistics of all the coverages whithin a provided bounding box.

wps:ProcessSummary.ows:Title: Dem Processing (hillshade, aspect, relief...)for a coverage/s that intersects with the input bbox
wps:ProcessSummary.ows:Abstract: provides processed results of all the coverages whithin a provided bounding box. The processes returns hillshade, aspect/ratio, slope and contour.

wps:ProcessSummary.ows:Title: Test Case 00: Literal data identity.
wps:ProcessSummary.ows:Abstract: Test identity process (the outputs are copies of the inputs) demonstrating various features of the literal data inputs and outputs.

wps:ProcessSummary.ows:Title: Test Case 01: Bounding box data identity.
wps:ProcessSummary.ows:Abstract: Test identity process (the output is a copy of the input) demonstrating various features of the bounding box data inputs and outputs.

wps:ProcessSummary.ows:Title: Test Case 02: Complex data identity.
wps:ProcessSummary.ows:Abstract: Test identity process (the outputs are copies of the inputs) demonstrating various features of the complex data inputs and outputs.

wps:ProcessSummary.ows:Title: Test Case 03: Complex data binary output with format selection.
wps:ProcessSummary.ows:Abstract: Test process generating binary complex data output (an image).

wps:ProcessSummary.ows:Title: Test Case 04: Literal input date-time time-zone test.
wps:ProcessSummary.ows:Abstract: Test processes testing time-zone aware date-time input data-type with automatic time-zone conversion.

wps:ProcessSummary.ows:Title: Test Case 05: Literal output date-time time-zone test.
wps:ProcessSummary.ows:Abstract: Test processes testing time-zone aware date-time input data-type with automatic time-zone conversion.

wps:ProcessSummary.ows:Title: Test Case 07: Request parameter.
wps:ProcessSummary.ows:Abstract: This test process demonstrates use of the RequestParameters input. The request parameter is a special input which passes meta-data extracted from the Django HTTPRequest object to the executed process.

wps:ProcessSummary.ows:Title: TC08: Test Case GetStatistics
wps:ProcessSummary.ows:Abstract: Test processes mimicking real world get statistics process

wps:ProcessSummary.ows:Title: TC09: Test Case GetStatistics Complex
wps:ProcessSummary.ows:Abstract: Test processes mimicking real world get statistics with complex output
